timeline.bodyText: @olegmoz I'd suggest to shorten the name of this class to simple YamlProxy, we can understand that this is repo config from the interface name.
timeline.author: olenagerasimova
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,126 @@

+
+import com.amihaiemil.eoyaml.Yaml;
+import com.amihaiemil.eoyaml.YamlMapping;
+import com.artipie.http.client.auth.Authenticator;
+import com.artipie.http.client.auth.GenericAuthenticator;
+import java.util.Collection;
+import java.util.Optional;
+import java.util.stream.Collectors;
+import java.util.stream.StreamSupport;
+
+/**
+ * Proxy repository config from YAML.
+ *
+ * @since 0.12
+ */
+public final class YamlProxyRepoConfig implements ProxyRepoConfig {

replies.bodyText: @olenagerasimova thanks, the name is actually too long. But I feel that YamlProxy would be misguiding: this object is not a proxy, but a config. So I changed it to YamlProxyConfig and moved to .repo package
replies.author: olegmoz

timeline.bodyText: @olegmoz I'd suggest to add test for absent remotes section, as far as I see orElseGet branch from YamlProxyRepoConfig line 61 is not tested...
timeline.author: olenagerasimova
